column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |    1    |    2    |    3    |    4    |    5    |
| color  |         |         |         |         |         |
| nationality |         |         |         |         |         |
| sport  |         |         |         |         |         |
| beverage |         |         |         |         |         |
| city  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 

There are 5 different favourite colors: blue, green, red, white, yellow
There are 5 different nationalities: british, danish, german, norwegian, swede
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
City: new-york, edinburgh, venice, liverpool, london
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: lacrosse, climbing, cricket, ice-hockey, skateboarding
1. the british is the person who likes red
2. the swedish is the person who's sport is cricket
3. the danish is the person drinking tea
4. the person who likes green is on the left of the person who likes white
5. the person who likes green is the person drinking coffee
6. the person traveling to venice is the person who's sport is climbing
7. the person who likes yellow is the person traveling to edinburgh
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the person traveling to london is on the left or right of the person who's sport is lacrosse
11. the person who's sport is skateboardings is on the left or right of the person traveling to edinburgh
12. the person traveling to new-york is the person drinking beer
13. the german is the person traveling to liverpool
14. the norwegian is on the left or right of the person who likes blue
15. the person traveling to london is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
